content.question:
Listen to the excerpt.

Which of the following correctly describes the shift in key relationship?

choices.label: It begins in major and shifts to the relative minor.
It begins in major and shifts to a closely related major key.
It begins in minor and shifts to a closely related major key.
It begins in minor and shifts to another closely related minor key.

content.answer: It begins in minor and shifts to a closely related major key.
